repairedDockerfile:
# docker build -t rtctunnel-demonstration:latest .

FROM alpine:latest

RUN apk add --no-cache bash curl redis python py-pip jq
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir yq

RUN curl -f -L https://github.com/rtctunnel/rtctunnel/releases/download/v0.2.0/rtctunnel_linux_amd64.tar.gz \
    | tar -C /bin -xz
